tool_description: A simple API to dynamically generate header banner with beautiful gradaints for your Github profile, MarkDown files or anywhere you like.
name: Dynamic Header Image
title: Dynamic Header Image

api_list.name: ✨ Geo Location 'Hello' banner
api_list.description:
Creates a SVG banner with beautiful gradiant with 'Hello' written in local language of the user hitting the API.
It checks the IP address location and present user with Hello screen.
Default language is English, in case there is any error determining user location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dynamic-header-image.p.rapidapi.com/?locHello=true"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dynamic-header-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
